passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(1) > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > main:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > h3:nth-child(1)
